title: My Sex Doll Bodyguard
overview: The story of chaos both body and mind occurs when Brick receives a package of mystery that is inside Anna Sex Doll AI system that Able to develop themselves as human beings Brick had to try sex with Anna to test its functionality. Otherwise, he will owe $ 50 million from his father's loan to invest in making sex dolls. Everything seems to be going well. But stuck that he is still a virgin and is afraid of women! What will the bricks do next? When he is the only one who will be able to touch her
